英文法規名稱: Regulations Governing Disposal and Sales through Open Tender of the Old Quarters for Military Dependents and National Land Not Fitting the Used of Military Camps
中文法規名稱: 國軍老舊眷村及不適用營地之國有土地標售或處分辦法
沿革內容:
1.Enacted and promulgated by the Ministry of National Defense on December 17, 1997
2.Amended and promulgated by the Ministry of National Defense on November 21, 2001, to be put into practice from the promulgation date.
3.Amended on January 08, 2010
4.Release of amendment to Article 6 under Ministry of National Defense Order Guo-Zhi-Yan-Shen-Zi No.1000000639 dates July 15,2011
5.Amended on March 27, 2013
6.Amended on July 19, 2013
7.Amendeded on January 22, 2014

法規內容.條文內容: These Regulations are duly enacted in accordance with Article 11, Paragraph 2 of the Act for Statute Governing Reconstruction of Old Military Dependents' Villages.

For sales through open tender of the national land covered in the Master Books of the Old Quarters for Military Dependents, the Ministry of National Defense may commission the National Property Bureau, Ministry of Finance to proceed with the tender procedures. In a case of land to be developed by means of urban renewal, zone expropriation, or concerted development, nevertheless, the Ministry of National Defense may commission other government institutions (entities) to proceed with the tender procedures.
In the event that no tenderer responds to the aforementioned open tenders twice, the Ministry of National Defense may sell the land at the upset price in the latest public announcement.
The costs required for the commissioning set forth in the first paragraph shall be determined by both parties through negotiation within the criteria of the Special Budget Land Handling Fees of Old Quarters for Military Dependents.

The national land covered in the Master Books of the Old Quarters for Military Dependents may be sold through open tender in consolidation with the neighboring public land. 
The open tender in consolidation shall be handled by the Ministry of National Defense in concert with the authority in management of the public land.

In case that the national land covered in the Master Books of the Old Quarters for Military Dependents is complicated in use condition and unable to be vacated within a short period of time and is desperately in need for disposal in an extraordinary condition, the Ministry of National Defense may have such land on the "as it is" basis through open tender.    
The land sold in open tender as mentioned in the preceding paragraph shall be handed to the awarded tenderer on the "as it is" basis.

The sale of the national land covered in the Master Books of the Old Quarters for Military Dependents which meets the following circumstances may be conducted by the Ministry of National Defense, or commissioned to the National Property Bureau by the Ministry of National Defense:
1. which is covered in a urban plan, occupying an area of no more than 500 square meters, and no more than 1/4 of the total land areas under the urban plan;
2. which shall be sold as essential for consolidated use with the neighboring land under Article 44 of the Construction Law as determined by a local government.
The examination and selling price under the circumstances referred to in the preceding paragraph shall be handled in accordance with the National Property Act and the relevant requirements. The commission fee shall be determined in accordance with Paragraph 3 of Article 2 herein.

National Army old military dependents Reconstruction of the total domestic land, there is one of the following circumstances, have to deal with the project to sell:
1. A corporation incorporated lawfully before the implementation of these Regulations and for the purpose of public welfare, as a public benefit For more than 20 years, it is still for public use.
2. the public sector business necessary.When applying for sale as a corporation or a public utility in the preceding paragraph, you should prepare a business plan and specify the price source . report to the competent authorities for the purpose of nuclear transfer approved by the Ministry of Defense after.

The Ministry of National Defense may, as the actual requirements may justify, commission private, public judicial person(s) to take charge of management, operation, improvement, utilization or provide for short-term, non-permanent leasehold, lending of the national land covered in the Master Books of the Old Quarters for Military Dependents.  The operating rules shall be separately enacted by the Ministry of National Defense.
The Regulations will be put into practice from the promulgation date.
